metadata.title: CVE-2022-48339 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU Emacs through 28.2. htmlfontify.el has acommand injection vulnerability. In the hfy-istext-command function, theparameter file and parameter srcdir come from external input, andparameters are not escaped. If a file name or directory name contains shellmetacharacters, code may be executed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48339` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-bin-common - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-common - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-el - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-gtk - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-lucid - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
emacs-nox - 1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:27.1+1-3ubuntu5.2').
xemacs21 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
